---
category: news
title: "Gecko Robotics helps power plant stay efficient"
excerpt: "Gecko Robotics is deploying its artificial intelligence and robotics at a West Virginia power plant. The Pittsburgh-based robotics company reached a partnership with American Bituminous Power Grant Town, a power plant in Grant Town, West Virginia. Financial terms of the three-year deal with the privately owned Gecko weren't disclosed."
